attributes.action: Support the Queen's invitation for Trump to visit the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
Donald Trump has been democratly elected as President of the USA. 
How he does that job is up to him and the American people.
He is following up on election promises, something other politicians could do well to copy.
We should support democracy!
attributes.background:
There is a petition trying to ban the visit of Donald Trump to the UK. 
The invitation was from the Queen, and no one has the right to interfere with that!
